job.title: Software Engineer I - Tiger Institute
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Hospital & Health Care
job.description: As a Software Engineer onsite at the Tiger Institute, you will be assigned to a specific research focus wherein you will be involved in writing and configuring code to meet user interface specifications for new and upgraded solutions. In this role, you will be participating in the full development life cycle of software solutions including defining the needs of the client, providing input for functional designing, testing, troubleshooting, and documenting. You will also implement designs by utilizing development languages and tools as per design specifications, routine review of solutions, suggest aesthetic improvements, and participate in project-related sessions such as code reviews and project status meetings. Additionally, you will be at the forefront of technology migration, rolling out cutting-edge tools to the larger developer community, and involved in the new generation Continuous Integration Framework for an enterprise solution.
